sentences.en: Don't divert the subject into a side issue.
sentences.cn: 别把话题转向枝节问题.

sentences.en: He can always invent a new game to divert the children.
sentences.cn: 他总能想出新的游戏来供孩子们娱乐.

sentences.en: He instructed switchboard staff to divert all Laura's calls to him.
sentences.cn: 他让总机接线员将劳拉所有的电话都转给他。

sentences.en: He’d been trying to divert suspicion away from himself.
sentences.cn: 他一直试图转移别人对他的怀疑

sentences.en: How can we divert her thoughts from her sad loss?
sentences.cn: 我们怎样才能使他不再想到她可悲的损失?

sentences.en: How otherwise can we divert ourselves?
sentences.cn: 我们还有什么别的消遣 呢 ?

sentences.en: I forget these tales cannot divert you.
sentences.cn: 我倒忘记了这些故事是不能供你消遣的.

sentences.en: I tentatively decided, unless conditions should improve , to divert the expedition into Gibraltar.
sentences.cn: 我临时决定, 除非情况转佳,将远征军开向直布罗陀.

sentences.en: If you haul hard you will divert the fish.
sentences.cn: 如果拉网太猛,鱼会被吓跑的.

sentences.en: John used to divert himself with billiards.
sentences.cn: 约翰过去总打台球自娱.

sentences.en: Northbound traffic will have to be diverted onto minor roads.
sentences.cn: 北行车辆将不得不绕次要道路行驶。

sentences.en: Remember to divert your phone when you are out of the office.
sentences.cn: 你不在办公室的时候要记得设定电话转移。

sentences.en: Such games divert the children.
sentences.cn: 此种游戏孩子们感兴趣.

sentences.en: The day being wet, she could not divert herself with rambling about the park.
sentences.cn: 这一天很潮湿, 她不能到花园里溜达解闷.

sentences.en: The high street is closed and traffic is being diverted .
sentences.cn: 大街封闭，车辆正改道而行。

sentences.en: The President needed to divert attention away from his own economic record.
sentences.cn: 总统需要将人们的视线从他以往在经济上的表现上转移开。

sentences.en: The trucks were forced to divert to another road.
sentences.cn: 卡车被迫改道而行.

sentences.en: The war diverted people's attention away from the economic situation.
sentences.cn: 战争把民众的注意力从经济状况上移开了。

sentences.en: To prevent flooding; we shall have to divert the river from its course.
sentences.cn: 为防止水泛滥, 我们必须使河流偏离其河道.

sentences.en: We thought it best to divert our shipping round the Cape.
sentences.cn: 我们认为还是把我们的航运绕道好望角为妙.

words.tran_cn: 使转移；使得到消遣（divert的现在分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 把注意力从…转移开来；分散注意力

trans.tran_en: to change the direction in which something travels

trans.tran_cn: 使转向， 使改道； 转移， 转移…的注意力； 使娱乐， 使消遣
trans.tran_en: to change the use of something such as time or money
